pages.text: $(turtlemancy)Turtle Lovers Rituals$() are those rituals that can only be performed by the Turtlemancers who treat turtles the right way. The $(thing)altar() must be charged with $(turtlemancy)Turtles blessings$() to perform any of this rituals.

pages.title: Ritual of the Sea
pages.description: This ritual will grant you a $(l:turtlemancy:equipment/bracelet_of_the_sea)$(item)Bracelet of the Sea$().

pages.title: Affinity Ritual
pages.description: Enchant your equipment with Turtles Aqua Affinity.

pages.title: Triton's Ritual
pages.description: This ritual will grant you the mighty $(item)trident$().
